Lucas Dasso
Laziness, impatience, and hubris.

About Me

I’m Lucas Dasso, Tech Lead and Fullstack Developer at VML Argentina, with over 10 years of experience. Passionate about technology, music, painting, and woodworking. These are just a few things that bring me joy.

When I’m not coding, I’m often lost in the worlds of science fiction. I’m a huge Star Trek fan (especially of Data!) and a devoted reader of the Dune saga (“I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer…”). I especially enjoy time paradoxes and collapsing function premises in both scifi books and TV shows.

Also, I enjoy curating my family digital library (check it out here!). Books are just wonderful!



Passions

  • Technology: Fullstack Web Development - PHP, Node.js, AWS, Python.
  • Art: Watercolors & Urban Sketching, Woodworking & Whittling.
  • Music: Transverse Flute, Piano, Ukulele.
  • Science: Astronomy.
  • Electronics: Arduino.
  • Sport: Taekwon-Do (1st Dan)
  • Reading: Mostly Science Fiction and Fantasy.
